sourcesContent:
// src/pages/Home.js import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Trophy, MapPin, Users, TrendingUp, Calendar, Star, Shield, Zap } from 'lucide-react'; import { getTurfs, getMatches, getLeaderboard } from '../utils/api'; const Home = () => { const [featuredTurfs, setFeaturedTurfs] = useState([]); const [upcomingMatches, setUpcomingMatches] = useState([]); const [topPlayers, setTopPlayers] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetchHomeData(); }, []); const fetchHomeData = async () => { try { const [turfsRes, matchesRes, leaderboardRes] = await Promise.all([ getTurfs({ sort: 'rating', limit: 3 }), getMatches({ status: 'scheduled', limit: 3 }), getLeaderboard({ type: 'rating', limit: 5 }) ]); setFeaturedTurfs(turfsRes.data.turfs || []); setUpcomingMatches(matchesRes.data.matches || []); setTopPlayers(leaderboardRes.data.leaderboard || []); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching home data:', error); } }; const features = [ { icon: Calendar, title: 'Easy Booking', description: 'Book your favorite turf in just a few clicks' }, { icon: Users, title: 'Create Teams', description: 'Form teams and challenge opponents' }, { icon: Shield, title: 'Lose-to-Pay', description: 'Competitive matches with real stakes' }, { icon: Zap, title: 'AI Matchmaking', description: 'Smart team matching based on skill level' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Welcome to TurfArena

Book turfs, create teams, and compete in exciting cricket matches

Browse Turfs Get Started
{/* Features Section */}

Why Choose TurfArena?

{features.map((feature, index) => (

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

))}
{/* Featured Turfs */}

Featured Turfs

View All ‚Üí
{featuredTurfs.map((turf) => (
üèüÔ∏è

{turf.name}

{turf.location.city}
{turf.ratings.average.toFixed(1)}
‚Çπ{turf.pricing.basePrice}/hr
))}
{/* Upcoming Matches */}

Upcoming Matches

View All ‚Üí
{upcomingMatches.map((match) => (

{match.team1?.name}

VS

{match.team2?.name}

{new Date(match.matchDate).toLocaleDateString()} {match.matchType}
))}
{/* Leaderboard Preview */}

Top Players

View Leaderboard ‚Üí
{topPlayers.map((player, index) => ( ))}
Rank Player Matches Rating
#{index + 1}
{player.name.charAt(0)}
{player.name}
{player.stats.matchesPlayed} {player.stats.skillRating}
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Play?

Join thousands of cricket enthusiasts on TurfArena

Sign Up Now
); }; export default Home;
